rules.fullName: Barrie 5 days prior to pickup - Infographic email send
rules.description: Sends an email 5 days prior to pickup with the infographic email (Things to remember day of pickup)

rules.fullName: Barrie Notification Assign Boat Specialist Retail ERP
rules.description: Sends email notification to Service Manager to Assign Boat Specialist

rules.fullName: Barrie Retail Boat Pickup Notification on Delivery Date Change
rules.description: Notifies Service Manager and Team when a Retail boat Is scheduled or rescheduled for Pickup (Delivery Date)
rules.formula: OR( AND( ISPICKVAL(Pickup_Location__c,"Barrie - Pick-up"), ISCHANGED(Delivery_Date__c) ), AND( ISPICKVAL(Pickup_Location__c,"Barrie - Delivery"), ISCHANGED(Delivery_Date__c) ) )

rules.fullName: Barrie Retail ERP - Tagging Pending
rules.description: Notifies the Sales Manager in Barrie that a new Retail ERP is ready for tagging

rules.fullName: Barrie_24_hours_Prior_to_Pickup
rules.description: Email sent to Barrie Customers 24 hours before Pickup

rules.fullName: Boat Numbers Order Submission - Barrie
rules.description: Sends boat numbers to the boat number supplier by location when boat numbers are entered on the Retail Boat Sale ERP.
rules.formula: RecordType.Name = "Retail Boat Sale" && CONTAINS(WarehouseName__c, "Barrie") && NOT(ISBLANK(Boat_numbers_erp__c)) && NOT(CONTAINS(Oppy_Boat_Model__c, "Loose")) && NOT(ISPICKVAL(Serial_Number__r.Status__c, "Used"))

rules.fullName: Boat Numbers Order Submission - Whtiefish
rules.description: Sends boat numbers to the boat number supplier by location when boat numbers are entered on the Retail Boat Sale ERP.
rules.formula: RecordType.Name = "Retail Boat Sale" && CONTAINS(WarehouseName__c, "Whitefish") && NOT(ISBLANK(Boat_numbers_erp__c)) && NOT(CONTAINS(Oppy_Boat_Model__c, "Loose")) && NOT(ISPICKVAL(Serial_Number__r.Status__c, "Used"))

tasks.description:
You have been assigned as Boat Specialist for this Retail ERP.
Please review the ERP and get with the Salesperson to review the ERP and ensure everything is correct.
Also, take this opportunity to call the customer to introduce yourself.
